titles.title: Financing Our Energy Future Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the publicly traded partnership ownership structure to energy power generation projects and transportation fuels, and for other purposes.
Financing Our Energy Future Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Financing Our Energy Future Act
The bill extends the tax treatment of certain publicly traded partnerships as corporations to renewable and alternative energy sources and transportation fuels. Under current law the tax treatment of such partnerships is only available to investors in energy portfolios for oil, natural gas, coal extraction, and pipeline projects.
